body_html: Nice idea, but I don't see that happening anytime soon ;). It will require the image pull to know which GPUs compute archs you have on the machine (either queried dynamically, or added to the docker configuration by the user). Also, you can have N compute archs on a single machine, so it's more complex that multi-arch.

body: Nice idea, but I don't see that happening anytime soon ;). It will require the image pull to know which GPUs compute archs you have on the machine (either queried dynamically, or added to the docker configuration by the user). Also, you can have N compute archs on a single machine, so it's more complex that multi-arch.
